name: Turret Tower
overview:
In this aerial combat simulator, the player assumes the role of an aircraft gunner who controls the gun turret and the direction of the aircraft with the option of six different weapons to use in firing upon the enemies. The mini-gun and the grenade launcher are available at the onset of the game and the player gets to have a choice of four "super" weapons. Two of the "super" weapons are unavailable until a specific level is reached.
Players can choose one of three levels whose difficulties vary. A bonus level is awarded to any player who can successfully complete the first three. All four levels have three different attack waves.

Various power-ups are awarded to any player who has the best homing and firing techniques. The power-ups are released by shooting parachutes during the gameplay.
